name: RUN FROM THE UNDEAD
description:
Run from the Undead is a web-based game that players can access on itch.io. It is developed by eeriEscape Studio. It is an endless runner game where the player controls a running character who must avoid obstacles and zombies.

To continue the game, a donation drive is open to anyone who wants to take part. Please note that there is no minimum or maximum donation amount, we are very grateful for your efforts to make a difference.
